backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, categories, photography works, and certificates with access‑controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing grouped‑works and hover‑info UI changes and the files involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML scaffold mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with manual routing, layout wrapper, theme provider, query client, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form component with validation, submission simulation, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/GroupedWorksSect: Component rendering a category header and grid of works with hover thumbnails and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Responsive site layout with navigation, theme toggle, mobile menu, and routing handler.
frontend/src/components/WorkThumbnailHov: Thumbnail component showing image with hover/focus overlay revealing work details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Determines authentication and admin status using actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useCertificates.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting certificates via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePhotographyWorks.t: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on photography works and category-based filtering.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioCategorie: React Query hooks for managing portfolio categories including create, edit, and delete.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing actor and loading state for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus base typographic styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with mission, values, and styled sections using icons and cards.
frontend/src/pages/CertificatesPage.tsx: Implements certificate listing and CRUD management with dialogs, forms, and auth‑gated actions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form and contact information with cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Presents a landing page with hero, features, and navigation buttons to other pages.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Supports portfolio category and work management with CRUD dialogs, tabs, and filtering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, feature list, known issues, and summary for a photography portfolio website.
